items.sentence: It was easy for Tom to convince Mary to help him.
Why are those people over there standing in line?
Tom thinks he\'s found a solution to the problem.
It wasn\'t long before Tom was able to swim well.
It wasn\'t the first time that Tom had been late.
You\'re not going to tell Tom the truth, are you?
You\'re not seriously considering going, are you?
You\'re not the only one who bought one of these.
Tom finally noticed that Mary was staring at him.
Tom forgot to ask Mary for permission to do that.
